title: Ticket #6087: Be able to set environment for DAG pre/post scripts
description:
The Pegasus people would like to be able to pass specific environment variables to pre/post scripts.

Maybe syntax could be something like this: 

  SCRIPTENV PRE|POST <node name> <name = value> ...

I don't think this should be very hard to do internally, because DAGMan is calling DaemonCore::Create_Process() to spawn the scripts, and that method already has a place to pass in environment variables.
